extendedInfo.description: Official application of Shaadi.com - The World's Largest Matrimonial Service. Access over 20 million matrimonial profiles of potential brides and grooms on your Android phone! Shaadi.com's award-winning Instant Messenger is now available on your Android phone! Download the latest version of this app and:-- Stay online on Shaadi.com IM from your Mobile - Browse Profiles of Online Members and initiate Chats- Receive Notifications whenever you receive a new Chat, even when you are not on the app!Using this FREE application you can also :- Create your Profile and start receiving Matches- Get INSTANT notifications on your Android device when you receive Chats, Interests, Accepts and Messages  - Search and view Profiles- Send Interests to matching Members- Respond to matrimony Interests- Shake your phone to get a Match using the 'Surprise Me' feature Available on devices with OS version 2.2 and aboveMore and more people are using our services to find their life partner. We at Shaadi.com are extremely proud of the numerous marriages where we have played a small role of helping our members find their soul-mate. We are now officially certified as the most visited, trusted and successful matrimonial website by prestigious organisations from India and abroad. We thank our members to have helped us in being honoured with awards such as:- Best Matrimonial Site (Reader's Choice Awards by About.com, USA)- Top 50 Most Innovative Companies (by Fast Company, USA)- Most Trusted Matrimonial Brand (By Brand Equity - Economic Times, India)With over 20 million members and a match being found every 2.4 seconds we are proud to be the world's largest matrimonial website.Download now, register and get started!Search Keywords: Shaadi, Shaadi.com, Shadi, Shadi.com, marriage, match making, perfect match, life partner, search life partner, search bride, search groom, marriage on mobile, mobile matrimonial, mobile matrimony, matrimonial, express interest, matrimonial apps, matrimonial site, matrimonial apps, indian marriage, hindu marriages, hindi matrimonial, bengali matrimonial, gujarati matrimonial, kannada matrimonial, kerala matrimonial, marathi matrimonial, marwadi matrimonial, punjabi matrimonial, tamil matrimonial, telugu matrimonial, urdu matrimonial, assamese matrimonial, sindhi matrimonial, parsi matrimonial, hindi matrimony, bengali matrimony, gujarati matrimony, kannada matrimony, kerala matrimony, marathi matrimony, marwadi matrimony, punjabi matrimony, tamil matrimony, telugu matrimony, urdu matrimony, assamese matrimony, sindhi matrimony, parsi matrimony

reviews.title: It\'s OK OK type.
reviews.comment: It loads every thing of shaadi. Com The problem is with the app. Doesn\'t go back, or you will be able to come out of the app.  Many a times (90%) I\'d to restart my phone for the sake of coming out of the app.

reviews.title: Very nice n easy to use...
reviews.comment: I found easy n time saving

reviews.comment: Thank you for making it easy n simple, request to provide edit access on mobile.

reviews.comment: Should be quick nd more features shd be added like different icon for accepted members

reviews.title: Best among the matt apps
reviews.comment: Work well and does most of the work it is intended to do. Highly recommend

reviews.comment: Nice and simple app... but please also provide a profile editing form.

reviews.title: Ease of getting updates all d time
reviews.comment: It gets un install aftr three or four days of its own....plz rectify it.

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Nice app but more functionality should be added like settings n all. Also surprise button should show new profile not repeat after 10-12.

reviews.title: App is very gud user friendly..
reviews.comment: But at times it hangs..and if we once upload our pics ..if we dont want it ..we are not able to identify how to chage it..but its realistic app..trust worthy..

reviews.title: Good enough to use
reviews.comment: Easy to open & navigate. Would recommend to others as well.

reviews.title: Excellent site
reviews.comment: I recommend this site to all my friends and relatives.

reviews.title: Lots of improvements required
reviews.comment: The app does make things easy but lack of photo only view makes things difficult and the random view is good but its gimmicky and it would be preferreble for the app to show a list of people tiled. Also the search mechanism is not seamless but gets the job done.
